name: Nami
text: On Play | When Attacking 1 (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area): Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {FILM} type card other than [Nami] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {FILM} type card other than [Nami] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
